sentences.sentence: Shoppers wrestled the raider to the ground.
sentences.translation: 购物的人把抢劫者摔倒在地上。

sentences.sentence: Angelina adopted Maddox when he was just seven months old after she visited a Cambodian orphanage while shooting her film Lara Croft: Tomb Raider in 2002.
sentences.translation: 2002年，安吉丽娜在拍摄电影《古墓丽影》时访问了柬埔寨的一家孤儿院，并收养了当时只有七个月大的马多克斯。

sentences.sentence: S Lara Croft: Tomb Raider made Jolie an international superstar.
sentences.translation: 01年的《古墓丽影》将茱莉捧为国际巨星！
